title: Diamond Droplet Pendant - Contemporary Elegance (కంఠాభరణము)
materials: G Color). Hyderabadi Polish for exceptional luster.
features: Modern openwork design with pavé set diamonds along the curves. Features a centrally suspended teardrop-shaped motif completely encrusted with diamonds. The design is a fresh take on the traditional Mangalsutra pendant, easily adaptable for daily wear. The rose gold provides a warm contrast to the brilliance of the diamonds.
occasions: Formal events. Perfect for the modern woman who appreciates subtle elegance.
description: This pendant combines contemporary design with timeless diamond brilliance. The use of 18K rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication. Expertly crafted and ethically sourced diamonds guarantee lasting value and brilliance. The design offers a unique blend of tradition and modernity, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's radiant glow.
